Dr. Sebastian Sitkewicz

Position: Alumni

Email: sebastian.p.sitkiewicz@gmail.com

Education

  • 2022: PhD in Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modeling (TCCM), University of Basque Country (UPV/EHU), San Sebastian, Basque Country.
  • 2017: MSc in Theoretical Chemistry and Computational Modeling (TCCM), Universidad de Valencia, Valencia.
  • 2015: BSc in Chemistry, Wroclaw University of Science and Technology, Wroclaw, Poland.

Research Topics

  • Development of density functionals for the calculation of nonlinear optical properties.
